text: Kalevi Oikarainen (27 April 1936 – 14 August 2020) was a Finnish cross-country skier. He competed between the 1950s and the 1970s. Oikarainen was born in Kuusamo. He won a bronze medal in the 4 × 10 km relay at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble. He died on 14 August 2020 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Finland Category:Finnish skiers
title: Kalevi Oikarainen
